Game.Name: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade 2002 - Gekisen! Team Battle!! Seiryuu no Shou - Takao Hen (Japan)
Game.plot: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade 2002 is an Action game, developed by AI and published by Broccoli,which was released in Japan in 2002.Cheat: Black Dragoon and Dranzer bladeEnter in password screen found in the city:Cheat: Black Dragoon and Dranzer bladeEnter in password screen found in the city:
